item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Playable Counter-Strike Diffusion World Model (trained on 2x4090, 5M frames) (188 points | 91 comments)
2. Turn your old laptop into low-end gaming machine (50 points | 24 comments)
3. Large language models reduce public knowledge sharing on online Q&A platforms (9 points | discuss)
4. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (1282 points | 363 comments)
5. WordPress.org's latest move involves taking control of a WP Engine plugin (217 points | 155 comments)
6. Stop Ignoring Your High Performers (44 points | 17 comments)
7. Exploring Typst, a new typesetting system similar to LaTeX (387 points | 138 comments)
8. Eating less can lead to a longer life: study in mice shows why (55 points | 26 comments)
9. Can logic programming be liberated from predicates and backtracking? [pdf] (109 points | 18 comments)
10. Omni SenseVoice: High-Speed Speech Recognition with Words Timestamps (90 points | 18 comments)
11. Lessons from Plain Text (41 points | 16 comments)
12. Two never-before-seen tools, from same group, infect air-gapped devices (187 points | 147 comments)
13. Every bug/quirk of the Windows resource compiler (rc.exe), probably (145 points | 16 comments)
14. Wim Taymans: PipeWire Inventor (18 points | 1 comment)
15. Pepsi's Soviet Navy (2021) (10 points | 1 comment)
16. Should we be thinking about luck differently? (10 points | 1 comment)
17. Germany's 49-euro ticket resulted in significant shift from road to rail (615 points | 588 comments)
18. Show HN: AOO – C++ library for real-time audio streaming and messaging (77 points | 12 comments)
19. Turkish language has a gossip tense (212 points | 174 comments)
20. FLUX is fast and it's open source (180 points | 82 comments)
21. Functional PHP (12 points | 1 comment)
22. The unreasonable effectiveness of plasmid sequencing as a service (15 points | 2 comments)
23. Washington's 'forgotten giant' volcano stirs (49 points | 19 comments)
24. DuckStation (159 points | 55 comments)
25. How I animate 3Blue1Brown [video] (796 points | 158 comments)
26. Heart rate variability differs between smartwatch and clinical testing (46 points | 29 comments)
27. The Explore vs. Exploit Dilemma (42 points | 7 comments)
28. Entropy Explained, with Sheep (2016) (55 points | 19 comments)
29. Lake Michigan Stonehenge – What have researchers learned? (76 points | 34 comments)
30. The 1/8th Sleep (138 points | 29 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
